AND ( TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status)='In Transit', [ServiceAppointment].SMS_In_Transit_Customer_Notification__c =FALSE, [ServiceAppointment].Account.Comms_Control_In_transit_text__c = TRUE ) , FALSE )

formulas.expression:

AND ( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status})='In Transit', {!myVariable_current.SMS_In_Transit_Customer_Notification__c} =FALSE, {!myVariable_current.Account.Comms_Control_In_transit_text__c} = TRUE ) , FALSE )
